# packagedapis

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This package explores how the mechanics of testing would work to using the R package structure to create and test APIs by moving functions to the R folder, and the actual API to the `inst` folder.

## Installation

The development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("edgararuiz/packagedapis")
```

## Example



```{r}
library(packagedapis)

```
